select hq_profit_log_id from hq_profit_log where 1=1
and status = #{status}
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y-%m-%d')

select sum(profit_amt) from hq_profit_log where 1=1
and status = #{status}
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%y-%m-%d')
